alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:29PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Custer and western Pennington Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sylvan Lake, or 4 miles north of Custer, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hill City, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Black Elk Peak, Crazy Horse Memorial, Sylvan Lake, Horse Thief Lake, Palmer Gulch Resort and northwestern Custer State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Southern Black Hills
